alert.note: Alert for Yukon Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 26 at 2:58PM AKST until March 01 at 3:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions and heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Yukon Delta. * WHEN...Conditions along the coast will deteriorate Monday night and then spread inland through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could blow items around. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
